article.title: U.S. Army Awards Shadow UAS Full-Rate Production Contract
article.text: AAI Corp., doing business as Textron Systems, Hunt Valley, Maryland, was awarded a $79,490,278 fixed-price-incentive, sole-source contract for fiscal 2014 Shadow tactical unmanned aircraft system (full rate production VII) in support of the Army and Marine Corps. Work will be performed in Hunt Valley, Maryland, with an estimated completion date of December 31, 2017. Bids were solicited via the Internet with one received. Fiscal 2014 other procurement funds in the amount of $79,490,278 are being obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity (W58RGZ-15-C-0047).
